glsa.title: IRC Services: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been reported in IRC Services.

background.p: IRC Services is a system of services to be used with Internet Relay Chat networks.

description.p: loverboy reported that the "default_encrypt()" function in file encrypt.c does not properly handle overly long passwords.

impact.p: A remote attacker could provide an overly long password to the vulnerable server, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All IRC Services users should upgrade to the latest version:
